mapper.sql: r.ID, r.FCreateTime, r.FCreateUserId, r.FFreezed, r.FDeleted, r.FChecked, r.FGUID, r.FType, r.FWidth, r.FHeight, r.FPath, r.FName, r.FFileFormat, r.FScrollType, r.FSpeed, r.FBackColor, r.FFontColor, r.FDefinition, r.FBranchId, cadv.FContractId,cadv.ID contractAdvId,cadv.FAdvId fadvclassid, car.FOriginalResourceId,car.FIsOriginalResource,car.ID carId, u.FName userName,b.FName branch,a.ftype temp,a.FPositionId,c.FTitle contractName
mapper.select: SELECT t_resource.ID, t_resource.FCreateTime, t_resource.FCreateUserId, t_resource.FFreezed, t_resource.FDeleted, t_resource.FChecked, t_resource.FGUID, t_resource.FType, t_resource.FWidth, t_resource.FHeight, t_resource.FPath, t_resource.FName, t_resource.FFileFormat, t_resource.FScrollType, t_resource.FSpeed, t_resource.FBackColor, t_resource.FFontColor, t_resource.FDefinition, t_resource.FBranchId,a.ftype temp,a.FPositionId FROM t_resource LEFT JOIN t_adv a ON a.ID = t_resource.FAdvClassId
